4 import rospy
5 
6 from franka_tut_reasoning.ontology_manager import TaskSemanticManager
7 
8 from franka_tut_reasoning.main import Reasoning
9 from franka_tut_reasoning.grounding_action_server import GroundingActionServer
10 from franka_tut_reasoning.task_server import TaskActionServer
11 
12 from franka_tut_msgs.msg import *
13 from franka_tut_msgs.srv import *
14 from std_msgs.msg import Empty
15 
16 def select_planner_mode():
17  mode = rospy.get_param("~mode")
18  print "SELECTED MODE IS : {}".format(mode)
19  if (mode == "automated"):
20  from franka_tut_reasoning.planner import AutomatedPlanner
21  result = AutomatedPlanner()
22  elif (mode == "interactive"):
23  from franka_tut_reasoning.planner import InteractivePlanner
24  result = InteractivePlanner()
25  elif (mode == "collaborative"):
26  from franka_tut_reasoning.planner import CollaborativePlanner
27  result = CollaborativePlanner()
28 
29  return result
30 
31 if __name__ == '__main__':
32  try:
33  #rospy.init_node('reasoning_node', log_level=rospy.DEBUG)
34  rospy.init_node('reasoning_node', log_level=rospy.DEBUG)
35  knowledge_manager = TaskSemanticManager()
36  planner = select_planner_mode()
37  server = TaskActionServer('task_action')
38 
39  reasoner = Reasoning(knowledge_manager, planner, server)
40  grounding_server = GroundingActionServer('grounding_action', knowledge_manager)
41 
42  #Initialize subscribers
43  rospy.Subscriber("franka_gripper_feedback", Action, server.actuator_cb)
44  #rospy.Subscriber("franka_sensor_feedback", Action, server.sensor_feedback_cb)
45  rospy.Subscriber("processed_inputs", Instruction, reasoner.callback)
46  rospy.Subscriber("grounding_triple", Instruction, grounding_server.new_triple_cb)
47  rospy.Subscriber("end_grounding", Empty, grounding_server.grounding_end_cb)
48  rospy.Subscriber("grounding_skill_link", Instructions, grounding_server.relate_skills)
49  rospy.Subscriber("human_done", Empty, reasoner.human_callback)
50 
51 
52 
53  rospy.spin()
54  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
55  pass
